description:
Access your to do list, turn emails into tasks, and collaborate on shared projects – all from within outlook.
      Say goodbye to lost and forgotten emails. Todoist lets you turn an email into a task with one click, so you'll always remember to follow up.
      Advanced task management features let you organize tasks into projects, set priorities and deadlines, and use color-coding to manage your inbox.
      Share projects, assign tasks to others, set deadlines, and collaborate on shared tasks in real-time, directly from your Outlook inbox.
author: Doist
